sources.title: Meadowland | Full Hollywood Movie | Olivia Wilde | Luke Wilson
sources.description:
Meadowland - In the hazy aftermath of an unimaginable loss, couple Sarah (Olivia Wilde) and Phil (Luke Wilson) come unhinged, recklessly ignoring the repercussions. Featuring Giovanni Ribisi, Elisabeth Moss, Ty Simpkins and John Leguizamo.
2015.  Stars: Olivia Wilde, Luke Wilson, Giovanni Ribisi

metadata.Plot: In MEADOWLAND Sarah (Wilde) and Philip (Wilson), deal with the unthinkable in the wake of their son's strange disappearance. Philip, a New York City policeman, attempts a more traditional form of healing, only to lose his moral compass. Sarah goes down an unexpected path towards acceptance as she places herself in increasingly dangerous situations.
metadata.Actors: Olivia Wilde, Luke Wilson, Giovanni Ribisi
